actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the financial consequences of removing professional baseball from the Robert F.  Kennedy Memorial Stadium.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that since the American Baseball League permitted the franchise of the Washington Senators baseball team to be moved from the District of Columbia, the league should compensate the District of Columbia Armory Board for any loss of revenues it sustains from the moving of such franchise.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the financial consequences of removing professional baseball from the Robert F.  Kennedy Memorial Stadium.
